page.title: 08A TENANT FARMER
page.content: Mr.Mclarens family have worked here for 119 years, but the owners live in America. There are 1150 acres of land. The road at the edge of his farm is known locally as "Dairy Lane" because there once an old dairy at the roadside. He keeps 600 sheep,50 cows; grows wheat, corn and peas which he sells to Batchelors. Spring barley makes beer, and most profit comes from wheat.He once kept pigs but did not like the smell! There are only 5 workers on the farm and he relies a lot on machinery which he sometimes hires as it is cheaper than buying it. Wild animals such as ducks, rabbits,pheasants are found on the farm. There are 4 silos to store grain and he grows about 2000 tons a year.
